commandDescription: Creates test data using mockaroo schema. Requires mockaroo schemaId and key. Set your mockaroo key using environment variable MAPIKEY
outputdirDescription: path of the output directory of file
formatDescription: file format of the output. Supported values are json/csv
countDescription: specify the number of rows of data needed
apiKeyMissingMessage: Mockaroo API key is not configured. Add your api key to environment variable MAPIKEY
